translated: The Pairs SectionğŸ”½With mind-contact as condition: with mind as condition, there is contact accompanied by mind. With contact as condition, there is feeling accompanied by contact. With feeling as condition, there is craving accompanied by feeling. With craving as condition, there is grasping accompanied by craving. With grasping as condition, there is existence accompanied by grasping. With existence as condition, there is birth accompanied by existence. With birth as condition, there is ageing, death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, grief, and despair; so there is the origin of this whole mass of suffering. This is called the development of understanding.ğŸ”½With mind-contact as condition: with mind as condition, there is contact accompanied by mind.
